rule: The output must not be an HTML formatted text.
input: Solitude can be rewarding. Silence is golden. Stillness is peace.
validityText:
The input consists of a paragraph of text. It contains three separate sentences: "Solitude can be rewarding.", "Silence is golden.", and "Stillness is peace.". Each sentence is distinct and ends with a period, meeting the requirement for at least three sentences in the input. The input also includes a combination of letters and punctuation and does not consist solely of whitespace characters. Thus, all specifications have been satisfied.

OK
